name: Upward Bird
description:
Upward Bird is a causal game designed for you to have fun wherever you are. You play as a bird trying to avoid asteroids which are falling from the sky. From high scores, you collect coins which are used to buy new skins from the store. If you want to gradually progress through difficulties, the campaign mode is for you! There are 12 different levels, each more difficult than the last. Collect in-game rewards such as exclusive skins, coins and backgrounds. 

Download Upward Bird today!

PC version coming soon!
